author: Deb Riechmann | AP
title: Trump warns Iran against attacking US troops in Iraq
description: President Donald Trump is warning Tehran that it should expect a bold U.S. response if Iran or Iranian-backed forces attack Americans in Iraq
content:
Earlier in the day, Trump tweeted: Upon information and belief, Iran or its proxies are planning a sneak attack on U.S. troops and/or assets in Iraq. If this happens, Iran will pay a very heavy price, indeed!
Trump withdrew from the Iran nuclear deal in 2018… [+615 chars]
source.name: The Washington Post

author: Steven Mufson
title: The scramble for the rapid coronavirus tests everybody wants
description: Abbott Labs to send first of its new coronavirus tests to beleaguered Detroit, as companies and research institutions scramble to come up with tests that the FDA will allow to detect the COVID-19 virus.
content: During a Tuesday meeting of the White House coronavirus task force in the Situation Room, Vice President Pence and other officials discussed diverting new tests to areas where there are relatively few cases, according to two individuals familiar with the matt… [+10031 chars]
source.name: The Washington Post

title: Shane Green, technology entrepreneur, dies at 49 - Houston Chronicle
description:
Shane Green, a technology entrepreneur, self-made millionaire and advocate of Internet privacy, died March 13 at a hospital in Washington. He was 49.

The cause was bile duct cancer, said a friend and colleague, Josh Galper.

Green was recogniz…
content:

author: Shayna Jacobs
title: N.Y. halfway house hit by coronavirus balked at judge's order to release at-risk inmate, his lawyers say
description: The Brooklyn House has the second highest number of confirmed covid-19 cases of any federal detention facility.
